about_the_game:
Weird Fantasy Bundle for Shadowdark RPG

This product contains three adventures by Taylor Seely-Wright.

Kazad Mor: The Cursed Dwarfhome

A classic dwarven fortress dungeon crawl for 1st level characters.
Crawlers delve into the cursed, abandoned halls of the dwarves. They delve for gold, glory, and magic. They delve to find the truth of the fortress and its abandonment.
What's inside?
  • 40+ room dungeon crawl for several nights of play.
  • Player and GM maps
  • 21 new monsters to challenge your friends.
What will players do?
  • Get trapped in a sprawling dwarven complex.
  • Scurry from room to room, eeking out survival as they gather precious loot.
  • Find an alternate escape route and finally get back to town in one piece.
Sounds cool. What else?
  • Find all three keys and unlock the dwarven vaults.
  • Discover the secret chamber holding the Runeforge.
  • Delve to the darkest reaches to destroy the Tablet of the Evil Eye and end the curse!

The Nightmare at Castle Goldgloom

Nightmare at Castle Goldgloom is an 0-level adventure compatible with Shadowdark RPG.
In it, crawlers delve into a nightmare haunted castle and try to escape with the loot... if they can avoid getting eaten.

Nightmare Garden of the Space Princess

A Lo-Fi, late-night TV horror movie adventure for 1st level characters.
Crawlers delve into a nightmare garden of xenobiology and bizarre extraterrestrials. The fate of the world hangs on how well the crawlers can make friends with a space god. Vibes are stoner rock, drive-in movie, cosmic horror, and funhouse dungeon.
What's inside?
  • 50+ room dungeon crawl for several nights of play.
  • Player and GM maps.
  • 21 new monsters to challenge your friends.
What will players do?
  • Die at a space victorian's garden party by eating too much neutron soup.
  • Befriend an intergalactic god and help her kill everything on earth, convince her to only tear the planet in half, or just leave you to rule the world for her.
  • Create a monster and pit it against your friend's creation. Or free all the monsters and watch them eat their masters.
Sounds cool. What else?
  • Get ripped apart and cloned by a particular vicious bed of flowers.
  • Meet a colony of humanoids with a time machine. Turns out, they are your children - and they'd like you to go back and time and get to making babies so they can exist.
  • Fight mimic topiaries, blood-sucking dryads, and tentacle monsters that inject eggs into you.
"
